content: A panel of arbitrators should decide whether a $146 million dispute between an Oregon utility and the sureties on its power-plant expansion project is subject to arbitration  a federal appeals court held on Monday.
name: Portland General Electric Company
title: 9th Circuit: Arbitrators must decide who hears PGE dispute
